SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: open drawer

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <DetectObject target="drawer_handle" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <OpenGripper width="0.09" timeout_ms="500"/>
    <ComputeGraspPose target="drawer_handle" strategy="pull" result_key="grasp_handle"/>
    <PoseAvailable key="grasp_handle"/>
    <ApproachAndAlign target="drawer_handle" tolerance="0.005" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <CloseGripper force="30" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <IsGraspStable/>
    <MoveDelta axis="x" dist="0.2" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <ContainerOpen target="drawer"/>
    <OpenGripper width="0.09" timeout_ms="500"/>
    <Retreat distance="0.1" timeout_ms="800"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>

SYSTEM: You are a BehaviorTree.CPP code generator.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Output ONLY one BT.CPP XML tree (no prose, no comments, no markdown).
- Format: <BehaviorTree ID="MainTree"> ... </BehaviorTree>
- Close all tags. Use readable node names and ports only when meaningful.

INSTRUCTION: raise pepsi can

Return only the XML.

<BehaviorTree ID="MainTree">
  <Sequence>
    <DetectObject target="pepsi_can" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <MoveAbove target="pepsi_can" offset_z="0.05" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <OpenGripper width="0.08" timeout_ms="800"/>
    <ComputeGraspPose target="pepsi_can" strategy="top" result_key="goal_pose"/>
    <GraspAtPose pose_key="goal_pose" strategy="pinch" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <ObjectInGripper target="pepsi_can"/>
    <RaiseHeld target="pepsi_can" distance="0.10" timeout_ms="1500"/>
    <HoldObject target="pepsi_can" duration_ms="1000"/>
    <Retreat distance="0.05" timeout_ms="1000"/>
  </Sequence>
</BehaviorTree>
